name: nncalc
description: NN size calculator for fully connected feed forward networks

scripts.clean: rimraf -f dist/ && rimraf -f docs/ && mkdir dist && mkdir docs
scripts.pegjs: npm run pegjs_cjs && npm run pegjs_global
scripts.site: cp src/html/.nojekyll docs && cp -r src/html/* docs && cp dist/parser.globals.js docs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run pegjs && npm run site

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
